arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Dortmund Grant Bologna Their First Ever UCL Win
arts.sum: He also had some pretty scary moments in build-up where he let the ball slip a couple of times, but I do believe Bologna would have had another goal if not for Schlotterbeck’s performance tonight. BVB just can’t seem to win games at the moment, and the trend continued after a very anonymous performance in the Emilia-Romagnan capital.

arts.ttl: Dortmund chief leaves Sahin's future as Dortmund coach open after Bologna loss
arts.sum: After Tuesday's Champions League defeat to Bologna, Borussia Dortmund's sporting director Lars Ricken wouldn't guarantee that Nuri Sahin will remain in charge.

arts.ttl: Quickfire double guides Bologna to victory over Dortmund
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League action resumed for Borussia Dortmund who made the trip to take on Bologna for Matchday 7. The hosts ran out 2-1 winners thanks to goals from Thijs Dallinga and Samuel Illing-Junior.
